description: This file defines a Python class 'Streamlit' that extends 'AwsApp' and configures a Streamlit application deployment, including environment variables and container settings.

classes.name: Streamlit
classes.description: A class representing a Streamlit application configuration for deployment on AWS, including environment setup and container parameters.

methods.name: get_container_env
methods.description: Generates environment variables for the container based on the Streamlit app configuration.
